description._content: Description: Windward Islands. 'St Lucia. Social Series: Health. Mothers with their babies attend the Bexen Health Centre, St. Lucia, for post-natal attention. Throughout the region, there are general and cottage hospitals, specialised institutions (e.g. mental and tuberculosis hospitals, leprosaria and homes for the aged and infirm), health centres and child welfare clinics'. Photograph No.: D. 106672. Official Windward Islands photograph compiled by Central Office of Information. Publicity statement on reverse. Location: Windward Islands Date: 1961 Apr Our Catalogue Reference: INF 10/379/2 This image is part of the Central Office of Information's photographic collection held at The National Archives, uploaded as part of the Caribbean Through a Lens project. We need your help to fill in the gaps, to unearth the missing stories, the social and cultural memories from this selection of colonial recordings. Do you recognise anything or anyone in the photographs? Do they provoke any personal or historical memories? If so, please leave your comments, tags and stories to enrich our records. If you would like to get involved in our community project Caribbean through a lens, we would love to hear from you. For high quality reproductions of any item from our collection please contact our image library
